mapper.select: select rc2.*, com.com_id,com.com_name,com.com_addr,com.com_sec, comm.comm_ctx ,res.res_title from (select rc.* from resume_contect rc where rc.ntc_code in(select n.ntc_code from notice n where n.user_id=#{mbid} and n.ntc_ctg='003')) rc2 inner join company com on rc2.com_id=com.com_id inner join resume res on rc2.user_id=res.user_id and rc2.res_code=res.res_code inner join comm on com.com_sec=comm.sub_cat where comm.main_cat='050' order by rc2.res_date desc
